de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans

Class KMeansPlusPlusInitialMeans<V,D extends NumberDistance<D,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.AbstractKMeansInitialization<V>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.KMeansPlusPlusInitialMeans<V,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Vector type
    D - Distance type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    KMeansInitialization<V>, KMedoidsInitialization<V>

    @Reference(authors="D. Arthur, S. Vassilvitskii",
           title="k-means++: the advantages of careful seeding",
           booktitle="Proc. of the Eighteenth Annual ACM-SIAM Symposium on Discrete Algorithms, SODA 2007",
           url="http://dx.doi.org/10.1145/1283383.1283494")
public class KMeansPlusPlusInitialMeans<V,D extends NumberDistance<D,?>>
extends AbstractKMeansInitialization<V>
implements KMedoidsInitialization<V>
    K-Means++ initialization for k-means. Reference:

    D. Arthur, S. Vassilvitskii
    k-means++: the advantages of careful seeding
    In: Proc. of the Eighteenth Annual ACM-SIAM Symposium on Discrete Algorithms, SODA 2007
